public class DisplayParam
extends java.lang.Object

The class contains all the parameters for display

Version:
visda_v0.1
Author:
Jiajing Wang

Field Summary
(package private)  int blob_size
           
(package private)  int flag_tc
          1: time course data without color; 0: phenotype data with color
(package private)  float[] p_color
          [1 1 1] There is no designated color, it is phenotype; Others, There is designated color, it is timecourse.
(package private)  double[] R
          for deep level display
(package private)  double thresholdZjk
          the threshold of posterior probability for display
(package private)  int vl1
          data display options: 0 -- plain, no labels; 1 -- with labels; 2 -- no labels, but with `depth coloring'; 3 -- with labels, and `depth coloring'; ('3' is valid in current version)
(package private)  int vl2
          data display options: 0 -- black background; 1 -- white background; ('1' is valid in current version)
(package private)  int vl3
          data display options: 0 -- no label# displayed; 1 -- with label# displayed; ('0' is valid in current version)

int vl1
data display options: 0 -- plain, no labels; 1 -- with labels; 2 -- no labels, but with `depth coloring'; 3 -- with labels, and `depth coloring'; ('3' is valid in current version)
